message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to you.  While I can't disclose all the details, I can assure you that this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  This price reflects its true potential. Consider it a strategic investment with potentially significant returns. Let me know if you'd like to discuss further.
